resources.string: MainActivity - When you open the app the last played song appears. This activity will handle the playing of song using Media Player. If you tap the Search button you can search songs in Spotify, Search Activity will open. By tapping the Equalizer button the Equalizer Activity will open, and you can modify the sound. If you don\'t have any songs, you must to add songs by tapping the + button. When you do so, a PlaylistAlbum Activity opens to add songs. In this new activity, you can scan your device for media files.
Number of song, mode of play

PlaylistAlbumActivity - On this screen you can see the albums. It is implemented in a ListView. An ArrayAdapter is attached to the ListView. A ListView element is the Artist\'s and the Album\'s name. By tapping an album the Playlist Artist Activity will appear and you can choose the songs of artist. But you can choose the full album too. Please tap the first item to try the link.
PlaylistArtistActivity - You can see the contents of album on this screen and you can choose the songs. It is implemented in a ListView with ArrayAdapter as in the PlaylistAlbumActivity.
SearchActivity - On this screen you can search for songs, artists or albums online through the Spotify website, by using Spotify API.
EqualizerActivity - You can modify the sound here. It uses the Android AudioEffects class to use the Equalizer.
